Posts.Content: Oct 14, 2007 08:33AM button wrote: I had lumpectomy 7 months ago and sentinel node biopsy for stage 1 grade one cancer no lymph node involvement.Hormone receptor pos and 5 days mammosite radiation 5 days x2 day.Felt fine no pain even stayed awake for surgery.now severe pain at surgical site all in breast.went to dr. given script for compression bra told to take 600mg alieve x2 day.i do heavy work lifting with my job.pain still there wonder why dr. did not say this could happendr. says very common .Has any one else had this??I have no lymphedeama
